trends: There have been no other sightings in Bentleyville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details it was 1966 ..iwas 11 yrs old at thetime,this has been bugging me for 35 yrs,i am 46 yrs old now..my sister and istill tell our kids the story. my cousins and i and sister were walking into thewoods to a clearing in the woods.all of a sudden the sky and stars were gone,,weall looked straight up and saw blackness with about fifty or so lights in aradious around the black part about fifty ft up. fifty yard radious ..all thelights were moving in place but pointing every where as if they were spotlightsmoving very,very very,fast..we saw no so called ship ,,just blackness and whitelights,,we all ran .since then i feel i have been changed somehow..I canremember it like a photograph and no sound of any kind could beheard,,,wind,,animals ufo ,,,nothing,,till we were far from the spot,and wetalked about it.it bugs me now that we did not see much,,but why is it imprintedinto my head of what we saw or did not see ,,wierd !!!!!
